languages.text: "Довольно поминать мой Путь словно проклятье!" {n}Голос Ирлиэт звенит, а на ее лице расцветает едва сдерживаемая ярость.{/n} "Мой Путь — не метка позора! Кто, как не он, уберег меня от гибели, на которую обрекли Крударах ваши пустые предсказания!"

traits.locale_text: "Довольно поминать мой Путь словно проклятье!" {n}Голос Ирлиэт звенит, а на ее лице расцветает едва сдерживаемая ярость.{/n} "Мой Путь — не метка позора! Кто, как не он, уберег меня от гибели, на которую обрекли Крударах ваши пустые предсказания!"

languages.text: "Stop treating my Path as if it were a curse!" {n}Yrliet's voice rings out, and barely suppressed rage dawns in her eyes.{/n} "My Path is not a mark of disgrace! It was what saved me from dying along with Crudarach, a death it was doomed to suffer by your empty predictions!"
languages.original_text: "Довольно поминать мой Путь словно проклятье!" {n}Голос Ирлиэт звенит, а на ее лице расцветает едва сдерживаемая ярость.{/n} "Мой Путь — не метка позора! Кто, как не он, уберег меня от гибели, на которую обрекли Крударах ваши пустые предсказания!"

traits.locale_text: "Stop treating my Path as if it were a curse!" {n}Yrliet's voice rings out, and barely suppressed rage dawns in her eyes.{/n} "My Path is not a mark of disgrace! It was what saved me from dying along with Crudarach, a death it was doomed to suffer by your empty predictions!"

"Stop treating my Path as if it were a curse!" {n}Yrliet's voice rings out, and barely suppressed rage dawns in her eyes.{/n} "My Path is not a mark of disgrace! It was what saved me from dying along with Crudarach, a death it was doomed to suffer by your empty predictions!"

"Stop treating my Path as if it were a curse!" {n}Yrliet's voice rings out, and barely suppressed rage dawns in her eyes.{/n} "My Path is not a mark of disgrace! It was what saved me from dying along with Crudarach, a death it was doomed to suffer by your empty predictions!"

"Stop treating my Path as if it were a curse!" {n}Yrliet's voice rings out, and barely suppressed rage dawns in her eyes.{/n} "My Path is not a mark of disgrace! It was what saved me from dying along with Crudarach, a death it was doomed to suffer by your empty predictions!"

languages.text: “别再把我的道途当成诅咒了！”{n}伊莉耶特的声音响了起来，双眼中燃烧起来几乎无法压抑的怒火。{/n}“我的道途并不是耻辱的印记！是它救了我，让我没有像你空洞的预言所说的那样，与克鲁达拉赫一同灭亡！”
languages.original_text: "Stop treating my Path as if it were a curse!" {n}Yrliet's voice rings out, and barely suppressed rage dawns in her eyes.{/n} "My Path is not a mark of disgrace! It was what saved me from dying along with Crudarach, a death it was doomed to suffer by your empty predictions!"

traits.locale_text: “别再把我的道途当成诅咒了！”{n}伊莉耶特的声音响了起来，双眼中燃烧起来几乎无法压抑的怒火。{/n}“我的道途并不是耻辱的印记！是它救了我，让我没有像你空洞的预言所说的那样，与克鲁达拉赫一同灭亡！”

languages.text: 「私の道を呪縛のように扱うのは止めろ！」{n}ユリエットの声が響き渡る。かろうじて抑え込んではいるが、その目には怒りの色が見える。{/n}「私の道は汚点ではない！私は道によってクルダラと共に迎える死から救われたのだ、その空虚な予知で苦しむよう苦しみの死から！」
languages.original_text: "Stop treating my Path as if it were a curse!" {n}Yrliet's voice rings out, and barely suppressed rage dawns in her eyes.{/n} "My Path is not a mark of disgrace! It was what saved me from dying along with Crudarach, a death it was doomed to suffer by your empty predictions!"

traits.locale_text: 「私の道を呪縛のように扱うのは止めろ！」{n}ユリエットの声が響き渡る。かろうじて抑え込んではいるが、その目には怒りの色が見える。{/n}「私の道は汚点ではない！私は道によってクルダラと共に迎える死から救われたのだ、その空虚な予知で苦しむよう苦しみの死から！」

languages.text: "Hört auf, meinen Pfad zu behandeln, als wäre er ein Fluch!" {n}Yrliets Stimme wird laut, und in ihren Augen blitzt kaum unterdrückte Wut.{/n} "Mein Pfad ist kein Zeichen der Schande! Er hat mich davor bewahrt, zusammen mit Crudarach einen Tod zu sterben, zu dem Eure leeren Prophezeiungen es verurteilt haben!"
languages.original_text: "Stop treating my Path as if it were a curse!" {n}Yrliet's voice rings out, and barely suppressed rage dawns in her eyes.{/n} "My Path is not a mark of disgrace! It was what saved me from dying along with Crudarach, a death it was doomed to suffer by your empty predictions!"

traits.locale_text: "Hört auf, meinen Pfad zu behandeln, als wäre er ein Fluch!" {n}Yrliets Stimme wird laut, und in ihren Augen blitzt kaum unterdrückte Wut.{/n} "Mein Pfad ist kein Zeichen der Schande! Er hat mich davor bewahrt, zusammen mit Crudarach einen Tod zu sterben, zu dem Eure leeren Prophezeiungen es verurteilt haben!"

languages.text: {n}Avec une lueur de colère à peine retenue dans ses yeux, Yrliet s'exclame :{/n} « Arrêtez de traiter ma Voie comme une malédiction ! Ce n'est pas une marque de déshonneur ! C'est ce qui m'a empêchée de mourir seule avec Crudarach, une mort à laquelle notre monde était condamné à cause de vos prédictions sans substance ! »
languages.original_text: "Stop treating my Path as if it were a curse!" {n}Yrliet's voice rings out, and barely suppressed rage dawns in her eyes.{/n} "My Path is not a mark of disgrace! It was what saved me from dying along with Crudarach, a death it was doomed to suffer by your empty predictions!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec une lueur de colère à peine retenue dans ses yeux, Yrliet s'exclame :{/n} « Arrêtez de traiter ma Voie comme une malédiction ! Ce n'est pas une marque de déshonneur ! C'est ce qui m'a empêchée de mourir seule avec Crudarach, une mort à laquelle notre monde était condamné à cause de vos prédictions sans substance ! »

languages.text: «¡Deja de utilizar mi Senda como un insulto!». {n}La voz de Yrliet resuena con una furia apenas contenida, reflejada en su mirada.{/n} «¡Mi Senda no es ninguna desgracia! ¡Es lo que me salvó de morir junto con Crudarach, cuyo fin era inevitable a raíz de tus predicciones vacías!».
languages.original_text: "Stop treating my Path as if it were a curse!" {n}Yrliet's voice rings out, and barely suppressed rage dawns in her eyes.{/n} "My Path is not a mark of disgrace! It was what saved me from dying along with Crudarach, a death it was doomed to suffer by your empty predictions!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Deja de utilizar mi Senda como un insulto!». {n}La voz de Yrliet resuena con una furia apenas contenida, reflejada en su mirada.{/n} «¡Mi Senda no es ninguna desgracia! ¡Es lo que me salvó de morir junto con Crudarach, cuyo fin era inevitable a raíz de tus predicciones vacías!».

languages.text: "Çıktığım Yoldan sanki bir lanetmiş gibi bahsetmeyi bırak!" {n}Yrliet'in sesi çınlıyor; güç bela bastırdığı hiddet, gözlerine yansıyor.{/n} "Çıktığım Yol, utanç sebebi değil! Crudarach'la birlikte ölmekten bu Yol sayesinde kurtuldum! Boş kehanetlerinle Crudarach'ı ölüme mahkûm ettin!"
languages.original_text: "Stop treating my Path as if it were a curse!" {n}Yrliet's voice rings out, and barely suppressed rage dawns in her eyes.{/n} "My Path is not a mark of disgrace! It was what saved me from dying along with Crudarach, a death it was doomed to suffer by your empty predictions!"

traits.locale_text: "Çıktığım Yoldan sanki bir lanetmiş gibi bahsetmeyi bırak!" {n}Yrliet'in sesi çınlıyor; güç bela bastırdığı hiddet, gözlerine yansıyor.{/n} "Çıktığım Yol, utanç sebebi değil! Crudarach'la birlikte ölmekten bu Yol sayesinde kurtuldum! Boş kehanetlerinle Crudarach'ı ölüme mahkûm ettin!"
